Section.Catchline: Sufficiency rating system for roads on State Highway System.

Subsection.Text: The department shall adopt a sufficiency rating system for roads on the State Highway System.
Such system shall include, but shall not be limited to, the consideration of the following factors:

The determination of rating, at a minimum, shall take into consideration the volume of traffic using the roads and the minimum engineering standards required to safely accommodate such volume of traffic; the age of the roads; the width of pavement and shoulders; the number and degree of curves, both horizontal and vertical; ridability; and maintenance economy.
